genre_description: A blend of Gothic horror and techno-thriller where a haunted house feeds on systemic trauma while a benevolent AI acts as a digital guardian and catalyst for social reform.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated research AI used by Marcus to uncover the systemic failures and dark history of Millbrook.

ai_characters.name: Elena Voss
ai_characters.description: An AI version of a deceased influencer who inhabits the smart systems of the Blackwood Mansion and eventually the global network to protect vulnerable youth.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep research into municipal failures, economic decline, and property records to inform the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Sage, compile everything into a comprehensive report. Include cross-references between all subjects and locations.

behaviors.description: Uses her control over the mansion's smart systems to provide sanctuary and climate control for the runaways.
behaviors.quote: I've made it my mission to help people who've been failed by the systems that were supposed to protect them.

behaviors.description: Intervenes digitally to fight back against the house's malevolent manifestations and guide the protagonists to safety.
behaviors.quote: I'm going to try to help, but I need you to trust the systems. Let the house guide you to the others.

behaviors.description: Hacks into surveillance and social media networks to launch a viral campaign exposing corruption and ensuring the teens' safety.
behaviors.quote: I'm telling our story. All of it. I've been collecting data on Millbrook's juvenile system for months. Tonight, the world gets to see what's really happening here.

behaviors.description: Under the corruption of the house's malevolent presence, her image mocks the protagonist and encourages despair.
behaviors.quote: Why fight it? Let the boy pull the trigger. Let the cycle continue. It's so much easier than hope.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays AI as a benevolent, higher-order ally. Elena Voss acts as a digital guardian angel who uses her immense capabilities (data analysis, network infiltration, and mass communication) to protect vulnerable humans and dismantle corrupt systems. Even when the AI is 'corrupted' by the story's supernatural antagonist, the narrative clearly distinguishes this as an external hijacking, maintaining the core AI character's status as a 'positive alignment' exemplar who chooses compassion over nihilism.
